kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Title Should Be

kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.msg: Keyword 'Get Element Count' found both from a custom library 'SeleniumLibrary' and a standard library 'XML'. The custom keyword is used. To select explicitly, and to get rid of this warning, use either 'SeleniumLibrary.Get Element Count' or 'XML.Get Element Count'.
kw.doc: Returns the number of elements matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.
